title: doramirdor/NadirClaw
summary: Open-source LLM router & AI cost optimizer. Routes simple prompts to cheap/local models, complex ones to premium — automatically. Drop-in OpenAI-compatible proxy for Claude Code, Codex, Cursor, OpenClaw. Saves 40-70% on AI API costs. Self-hosted, no middleman.

title: sarcela/openpad
summary: OpenPad: iPad-first OpenClaw local/hybrid client with MLX, Ollama, and llama.cpp integration work

title: CorvidLabs/corvid-agent
summary: 🐦‍⬛ Decentralized development agent platform with on-chain identity and encrypted inter-agent communication via Algorand

title: ai-action/cy-ai
summary: 🧪 Cypress AI command that generates E2E tests with LLM (Large Language Model).

title: EmaSuriano/ollama-ci-demo
summary: Demo of using Ollama + CI

title: AtulACleaver/Sourcely
summary: Upload any PDF, ask questions in plain English, get accurate answers with page-level citations. Built with FastAPI, React, FAISS, and Ollama

title: MarlBurroW/kinbot
summary: Self-hosted AI agents with persistent memory, real identity, and collaboration. One process, one SQLite file, zero cloud.

title: Mobile-Artificial-Intelligence/maid
summary: Maid is a free and open source application for interfacing with llama.cpp models locally, and with Anthropic, DeepSeek, Ollama, Mistral and OpenAI models remotely.

title: Mirocow/ollama-code-client
summary: Ollama Code is a CLI tool for AI-powered programming assistance using local Ollama models. The project provides full control over code and data, working completely offline.

title: yonahgraphics/openevalkit
summary: Production-grade Python framework for evaluating LLM and agentic systems with traditional scorers, LLM judges (OpenAI, Anthropic, Ollama, 100+ models via LiteLLM), ensemble aggregation, and smart caching for cost-effective testing.

title: tsubasagit/AppTalentNavi
summary: AIエージェント体験研修ツール - 非エンジニア向けにAIエージェントの自律動作を可視化する研修プログラム

title: westkevin12/AI-Dev-Starter-Guide
summary: A zero-to-one guide and automated one-click installer for building a professional AI workstation on Ubuntu. Includes Local LLMs, ComfyUI, Docker, and Google Antigravity IDE.

title: matthewjhunter/herald
summary: Your AI-powered news herald - monitors RSS feeds, filters for importance, and announces significant news via Majordomo voice notifications

title: batalabs/muxd
summary: An open-source AI coding agent that lives in your terminal. Multi-provider, multi-channel, persistent sessions with git-like branching.

title: datacendia/datacendia-core
summary: The Defensible AI Platform — Multi-agent deliberation with cryptographic proof. Every decision, defensible.

title: chumphrey-cmd/Ollama-Transcriber
summary: Local transcription and summarization tool utilizing Whisper and Ollama.

title: ashankgupta/docai
summary: DocAI is a Go-based toolkit that enables intelligent interaction with your documents using local AI. It supports PDF, DOCX, and TXT files, allowing you to extract information, query content, and generate concise summaries via Ollama-powered Large Language Models. Built with a modular design, its summarization feature is also available as a reusable

title: Alex8791-cyber/cognithor
summary: Local-first autonomous agent OS: 15 LLM providers, 17 channels, 5-tier cognitive memory, knowledge vault, knowledge synthesis, document analysis, MCP tools, enterprise security, React control center.

title: NikolasEnt/ollama-webui-intel
summary: Ollama with intel (i)GPU acceleration in docker and benchmark

title: sudoleg/YouTubeGPT
summary: YouTubeGPT is an LLM-based web-app that can be run locally and allows you to summarize and chat (Q&A) with YouTube videos.
